name: TurnUp $LFG
description: The in-game deflationary token for CRYPTO TRILLIONAIRE, an idle strategy game built on TURNUP. $LFG is a fair launch token that can only be farmed by playing CRYPTO TRILLIONAIRE on TURNUP. Players must consume $LFG to engage in PvP Battles, Upgrades, Unlock Missions, Enter Raffles, Acquire Tools, Acquire Helpers.
